item.title: Timeless 4ttitude
item.description:
Timeless 4ttitude

  1. Coloursound - Fly With Me (Original Remastered Version)
  2. Djuma  Soundsystem - Les Djinn (Swen Weber remix)
  3. Sir-G & DJ Sake - 2 Spirits (Yves V Remix)
  4. Gadjo - So Many Times (Original Mix)
  5. Shannon - Let The Music Play (Andrew Fonda Remix)
  6. Paris Avenue - My Life is Muzik (extended mix)
  7. Shakedown - At Night (Kid Creme Club Mix)
  8. Joey Beltram - Slice 2010 (Carl Cox Rerub)
  9. Cicada - The Things You Say (Dirty South Remix)

* Contest Mixt4pe Café d' Anvers on vi.be

item.title: Discot3ch
item.description: 01. Jean Maxwell & DJ Brad - Turn The Beat Around (TTBA) - (Jean Maxwell Club Mix)* 02. The Black Project - Off the Wall (Simioli & Black Original Mix) 03. Digital Freq - Disco Falls (Original mix) 04. The Groove Foundation - That Feeling (DJ Chus De Poniente 2010 Revisited Mix) 05. Tomcraft - Loneliness 2010 (Lissat & Voltaxx Remix) 06. item.title: Hi5 - Funky House Mix
item.description:
1. Melissa Storm - Mesmerized (Jean Maxwell Remix)
  2. Sander Van Doorn – Ninety
  3. Yeah Yeah Yeahs - Heads Will Roll (Club Mix)
  4. Wamdue Project  - King Of My Castle (Nicola Fasano and Steve Forest Mix)
  5. Stacker - Tell Me Why (Club Mix)
  6. Ferry Corsten Ft. Novastar - Because the Remix (Original Extended)
  7. Andy Moor & Ashley Wallbridge Feat. Meighan Nealon - Faces (Original Mix)
  8. Ian Carey - Shot Caller (Vocal Mix)
  9. Sampler & Kohary -Seven Nation Army (Tim Sanchez and Dancefloor Devils Electroclub Remix)
  10. Richard Durand - Xelerate (Full House Mix)
  11. Fake Blood - I Think I Like It (Original Mix)
  12. Hip Kid - Sweet Dreams (Original Mix)

2010 All rights reserved.
